title: Fun Spaghetti-Shaped Plastic Spaghetti Spoon/Pasta Fork from a Series of Pasta-Inspired Kitchen Gadgets | Cool Pasta Spoon to Claw and Serve Pasta | Original Kitchen Accessories | by Monkey Business
features: REMOVE AND SERVE YOUR PASTA SPECTACULARLY. Use this kitchen spoon whenever you need to stir, claw out of the boiling water, and serve your spaghetti. Keep this kitchen utensil at hand to never overcook or drop pasta while making meals for yourself or your loved ones.

FIT FOR MANY LONG PASTAS. Initially inspired by spaghetti (or spaghettoni, rather, as they’re quite thick), these kitchen utensils will also work when you need to fish out and transfer to the sauce pot or the serving dish other varieties of long pasta like fettuccine, linguine and capelli d’angelo.

GET ONLY FUN AND COOL GADGETS! Our mission is to deliver kitchen tools and cooking utensils that make the cooking process more exciting and impress the guests. It’s extra gratifying when the stuff we make, like these kitchen spoons, is also practical and helpful.

ORIGINAL DESIGN. Made entirely of plastic, these utensils were designed originally by Monkey Business. If you ever cook pasta (who doesn’t?), a pasta server is among absolute kitchen must haves, and we made ours extra durable to serve you for years.

A PERFECT GIFT. Unique kitchen gadgets make wonderful gifts for anyone who likes to cook. Long pastas are tricky, and a pasta spoon with teeth is a solution. A spaghetti server perfectly complements your kitchen accessories, and our fun kitchen gadgets also add to the loveliness of your home.
